scripts.api:migrations-new: cd apps/api && sh -c "if [ -z '$$NAME' ]; then echo 'Error: NAME parameter is required'; echo 'Usage: bun run api:migrations-new -- NAME=migration_name'; exit 1; fi; migrate create -ext sql -dir ./internal/database/migrations -seq '$$NAME'"
scripts.api:migrations-down: cd apps/api && sh -c "printf 'Are you sure? [y/N] ' && read ans && [ "$${ans:-N}" = "y" ] && migrate -database "$$API_DB_DSN" -path ./internal/database/migrations down 1 || echo 'Aborted'"
scripts.api:migrations-up: cd apps/api && sh -c "printf 'Are you sure? [y/N] ' && read ans && [ "$${ans:-N}" = "y" ] && migrate -database "$$API_DB_DSN" -path ./internal/database/migrations up || echo 'Aborted'"
scripts.api:tidy: cd apps/api && go fmt ./... && go mod tidy && go mod verify
